steps.1: Microwave-Microwave on high for 90 seconds until the egg is cooked through
steps.3: add-add bread pieces to the egg mixture in the mug, pressing the bread down into the egg
steps.5: melt-In a large mug, melt 1 tablespoon of softened butter in the microwave for about 30 seconds
steps.6: Sprinkle-Sprinkle 1/4 teaspoon cinnamon over the egg
steps.7: cut-cut the contents on plate, and serve
steps.8: Put-Put the mug's contents on a plate
steps.9: Roll-Roll the butter around in the mug to coat it
steps.10: Cut or tear-Cut or tear 1 slices of bread into bite-size pieces
steps.11: Add-Add 1/4 teaspoon vanilla extract to the mug
steps.12: whisk-In the mug, whisk one egg with a fork until well blended
